alert.note: Alert for Gage; Saline; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:10AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Seward, Saline and northwestern Gage Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 510 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles east of Cordova to 3 miles north of Fairmont. Movement was southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Friend around 515 AM CDT. Dorchester around 520 AM CDT. Tobias around 530 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wilber, Western and Clatonia. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 369 and 373. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
